hero_title: STEM is more fun with friends.
hero_subtitle: A passionate team of high schoolers competing in FIRST Tech Challenge
story_text1: Axis is a rookie team based in Chișinău, Moldova. It all started in 2024, as a group of friends with a common love for applied physics, programming, and robotics.
story_text2: We are a team of 15 passioned members, working together to design, build and program robots, while also having fun side-projects on the side.
story_text3: Our team remains deeply committed to promoting STEM education in our country, inspiring future engineers into doing what they love.
team_subtitle: *subject to change, following latest selection process*
desc1: Robot designer, the brain of operations, team manager
desc2: Specializes in CAD design and mechanical systems
desc3: Develops teleop routines, site manager, extra projects
desc6: Develops autonomous routines, teleop, analyzes mechanism implementation
desc5: Takes care of posts, social media accounts, etc.
goals_subtitle: What drives us to innovate and compete
goal1_desc: Perform well at National Championships, and show results at International Championships.
goal2_desc: Develop new robot solutions, while also having club side-projects
goal3_desc: Make sure every member feels at home, while contributing in their own way.
goal4_desc: Promote STEM education through the country
goal5_desc: Build relationships with technology companies and universities
goal6_desc: Help members develop technical and professional skills
contact_subtitle: We'd love to hear from sponsors, partners, and fellow teams
trademark: FIRST® is a registered trademark of For Inspiration and Recognition of Science and Technology.
